tool.name: SNP Primer Design
tool.description: for each sequence in a CSV file

param.name: CAPS
param.label: Design CAPS/dCAPS primers?
param.help: If yes, CAPS/dCAPS primers will be designed.

param.name: KASP
param.label: Design KASP primers?
param.help: If yes, KASP primers will be designed.

param.name: blast
param.label: Blast the output primers in the wheat genome?
param.help: If yes, will blast against Chinese_Spring_v1.0_pseudomolecules.

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This pipeline can make KASP primers and CAPS/dCAPS primers based on SNP flanking sequences.
The input file is the same as polymarker.
